Blast Pit.requires: |Blast Pit| AND (|@Early Weapon:2| OR |Grenades| OR |Satchell Charges|)

On A Rail.requires: |On A Rail| AND (|@Early Weapon:3| OR |@Mid Game Weapon:1|)

Questionable Ethics.requires: |Questionable Ethics| AND (|@Early Weapon:2| OR |@Mid Game Weapon:1| OR |@Late Weapon:1|)

Surface Tension.requires: |Surface Tension| AND (|@Early Weapon:4| OR |@Mid Game Weapon:4| OR |@Late Weapon:2|)

\"Forget About Freeman!\".requires: |"Forget About Freeman!"| AND (|@Early Weapon:3|) AND (|@Mid Game Weapon:2|) AND (|@Late Weapon:2|)

Lambda Core.requires: |Lambda Core| AND (|@Early Weapon:4| AND |@Mid Game Weapon:4|) OR (|@Late Weapon:4|)

Gonarch's Lair.requires: |Gonarch's Lair| AND |Long Jump Module| AND (|@Early Weapon:5|) AND (|@Mid Game Weapon:4|) AND (|@Late Weapon:3|)

Interloper.requires: |Interloper| AND |Long Jump Module| AND (|@Early Weapon:3|) AND (|@Mid Game Weapon:2|) AND (|@Late Weapon:2|)

Nihilanth.requires: |Nihilanth| AND |Long Jump Module| AND (|@Early Weapon:5|) AND (|@Mid Game Weapon:5|) AND (|@Late Weapon:3|)
